page.title: 08TRADE & TRANSPORT IN S'REPPS
page.content: TRADE: The area is well served with two sub post offices, also 2 other generaql stores, butcher, bric-a-brac, public house, several handymen in decorating . carpentry, plumbing, building, car repairs, gardening,etc. SERVICES: Postal delivery, milk, bread, papers daily. 2 fishmongers weekly. Other deliveries include gas, oil, coal, wood together with window cleaners and public mobile library. TRANSPORT: approx 75% of households have cars, many have bicycles. Private bus company serves area 4 times weekly to nearby towns. Rail service a mile from village with frequent trains to Sheringham, N. Walsham & Norwich. ROADS: Mostly narrow rural lanes.
